data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
The away team have replaced Steeven Willems with Modou Diagne. This is the first substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
Elisha Owusu (Gent) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Shamar Nicholson gives Charleroi a 0-1 lead.
Milad Mohammadi is booked for the home team.
Goal! Charleroi extend their lead to 0-2 through Marco Ilaimaharitra.
The first half has been concluded at Ghelamco Arena.
The second-half is now underway.
Anderson Niangbo is replacing Giorgi Kvilitaia for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
The home team replace Brecht Dejaegere with Giorgi Chakvetadze.
It's now 0-3 in Gent as Mamadou Fall scores for Charleroi.
Goal! Anderson Niangbo pulls one back to make it 1-3.
Ryota Morioka (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
Jess Thorup is making the team's third substitution at Ghelamco Arena with Dylan Mbayo replacing Roman Bezus.
Karim Belhocine (Charleroi) is making a second substitution, with Kayembe replacing Ali Gholizadeh.
Milad Mohammadi (Gent) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Charleroi take a comfortable 1-4 lead thanks to Kaveh Rezaei.
The match is over. Final score 1-4.
Gaetan Hendrickx is replacing Marco Ilaimaharitra for the away team.
